p: The potential of pyrazine 1 (and its derivatives 10â€“ 15) is well past the thermodynamic hydrogen evolution limit and close to the kinetic hydrogen evolution limit. That is a possible obstacle for use in a RFB system for both safety issues and loss of efficiency. Therefore, a representative system of six differently-substituted quinoxalines ( Figure 5) was investigated in the same way as for pyrazines with a special focus on the effect of different functional groups.
